Articles.Content: 1114: You decide to push the floor up, rather than yourself. You waste quite some time trying to figure out how to accomplish such a feat. you then give uo and move on.
1115: It is a strange, round floor, with strobe lights everywhere, it is also very dark, you stumble your way towards the exit.
Floor 1116: Someone behind you knocks you in the head with a pipe. You hear, before you black out, a cackle that sounds strangely like "MOAR BOOSTERS" in reverse Spanish.
1117: You hear ominous music and what sounds like "Koy on is quad ski"
1120: Aliens!

Seems like the user above me doesn't know how to count, so I'll fill in the gap.

1118: It's pitch black and dead silent. You're terrified and dash to the next floor.

1119: You see a huge model train set and look at it for a while as several model railroaders run their consists around the room.
1121: so many drunk guys
1122: It is pitch black. You see Slenderman and run to the next floor.

1123: For some reason, most of the previous floors have something to do with horror themes. This floor is completely white, with no lights seen, but still quite bright. You see a Kerbal sitting on the ground talking to someone on his phone: "He's here. Don't forget the SRBs." Before you get hit over the head by a large rocket engine, you escape up to esculator.
1124: saw enterelysium playing ksp

No posts since last month? Damn.

1125: Saw Harvey delete KSP off of his computer. A tear slowly runs down your face as he clicks the button. You hope he hasn't completely given up on this. You hope, but Harv ain't gonna play it anymore. You slowly walk up the stairs to the next floor.

*hint hint nudge nudge* Hope he finds stuff to do in KSP. Sucks to lose KSPers like Harv. Hope he reads this too.
1126: You see Scott Manley and when you ask him for autograph, he chases you like a demonic rabbit to the next floor.
1127: 209 more floors to the exit on floor 1337
1128: You see a small paper that reads: "This building has been expanded to be 10000 floors high, More expansions may be done"

"1130" (1129): finds a note on the door to this floor that says, "We gave floor 1129 the slip and went straight into 1130"

jk

(for real this time)

1129:finds a note on the door that says, "Floor down for maintenance, go to next floor!"
1130 you see my paradox from king of the hill.

1131: It looks like any other floor, but the air smells of gasoline. Weird.

1132: You open the door...

1133: ...The room looks like a normal room, but after leaving you notice that the floor number is 1133. You thought it was 1132 when you walked in, and are confused.

Edited March 6, 2015 by mythbusters844
1134 you pass through an airlock on the way up the stairs. you are now in space
1135: You climb back into the tower and continue ascending, forgetting to open the door of this floor.

1136: A thin plane of some kind of viscous, black liquid is falling all the way across the door to the floor; you can't see anything beyond it and it looks rather malignant, so you decide not to try your luck running through it.

1137: A sign in the middle of the room: "200 floors til my next noscope!" You look out the window and look up to see flashes of gun mussels and critical hits coming from high up. When you try to lean further out, you glance down to see that you are kilometers above the surface, and start to get short of breath. You duck inside and close the window before you loose oxygen. You head up the stairs.
1138: A wild Pokemon apppears! It kicks you up to the next floor!
1139: a nuke happens to the next floor.
1140: you start to wonder why anyone would build a building so tall as you realize that the 1140th floor is missing except for the stairs which you have to parkour to.

1141: you notice this floor has nothing strange on it. you feel panicked. you realize, something HAS to happen strange.

you collapse,and wake up with all the previous floors flying up around the building. you keep climbing.
